snippet: Since the world rankings have been established, every winner at Royal Lytham & St. Annes, the site of this year’s British Open, has at some point been the No. 1 player in the world.
abstract: Course at Royal Lytham & St Annes Golf Club, site of the British Open, is unusually difficult; every player who has won at the course has at some point been No 1 in the world, which cannot be said about any other site of the British Open that has hosted the event more than once.
lead_paragraph: Since the world rankings have been established, every winner at Royal Lytham & St. Annes, the site of this year’s British Open, has at some point been the No. 1 player in the world.

headline.seo: 2012 British Open — Course Is Test of a Champion
headline.main: A Challenge That Is the Stuff of Legends
headline.print_headline: A Challenge That Is the Stuff of Legends
